entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-07-30
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Shell Navigation will not re-route to the same route even if querystring is different #16442
  • Android NavigationPage in inconsistent state if Push/Pop operations are performed sometime after app deactivation #16441
  • Shadow Radius on API 33 not fixxed #16440
  • Error "NSInternalInconsistencyException Reason: Invalid update: invalid number of sections" in CollectionView on iOS still not closed #16438
  • Tab doesn't work correctly with CollectionView on Windows platform #16437

Closed

  • SetAppThemeColor for Label or Entry background colours only works on initial state on release builds #16430

PullRequests

Updated

  • [ci] Run Codesign Verification after MSI creation #16423
  • [housekeeping] Automated PR to fix formatting errors #16427
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area/infrastructure 🏗️
